message: If you want to specifically mention things the DjangoCon organisation should know about, please mention it here.
i meant "De Zwijger"

participants are bringing in more than one mobile device that connect to the wireless network in "De Waag" ? ... a few weeks ago, i attended the Adobe 5.5 event (DeLaMar), they failed in facilitate a /22 network...
tweakboy we have the main conference location covered with 10 AP's installed by a professional networking company we where adviced for the setup by someone from RIPE. so we should be fine
@danfairs Yeah I see it too. We'll try and fix it in the next break, doing focus-stuff now is the only thing that *would* disrupt the talk :S
Any chance of getting the focus on the left projector screen sorted? It's all a bit fuzzy over here.
@niels_bom Great - thanks!
@jfdsmit yes
sshanx mentioned it..
I missed this morning... has everyone been alerted that GVB is on strike tomorrow?
ok, then I said nothing... wait I did....
Cmd-Z!
get some anaglyph glasses.... the beamer is showing 3d layers...
@tweakboy, which one?
same problem with the left screen...

Just went on a long walk to collect my complimentary hire bike from MacBike, Central Station, but I couldn't because they are closed.  Does anyone know if I can collect my bike from the local shop, i.e. the one near Waterlooplein?  Thank you.

A nice trick I've seen done at other conferences is to print the schedule on the back of the name badge - then it's really easy to access as it's hanging around you neck.  It's a bit of a pain to have to visit the website to see what's on next.
@pkimber Happy to say, the local shop let me have a bicycle.
It would be great if there were more drinks. Maybe in bottles.
@keimlink +1
Are there any more free bikes available? I missed the 30 min window yesterday when they were handing out the free bike passes.
@keimlink oh yeah. those tiny glasses almost evaporate before you can bring it to your mouth

@codeinthehole did you download the Guidebook app already? That's real handy too. But I admit that, esp with just one track we could have printed it on there. But even with one track it would still be quite cramped.
Maybe use different lanyards next time.  This ones are - quite literally - a pain in the neck
@niels_bom The clasp and ends of the band are very scratchy / itchy
@niels_bom yep, I like it.  I'm just really lazy
@natea did you get one today? We've been handing them out again.
@danfairs thanks, should be less now
@ulope What's wrong with these ones then?
There's a slight ring on the conf audio. Pretty minor, but nice if it could be fixed.
@ulope I don't have the same problem, but sorry anyways..
@niels_bom Sounding great now, thanks.
The audio seem to be a little louder than necessary this morning... could it be turned down a bit please?
There are no papertowels in the toilet on the hacking-floor anymore.
fecale streptococcen are most common on keyboards ;-)
